___OtherInfo.description: Placeholder for information that does not fit in any other attribute

___CreationTime.description: The creation time of this entity in the format: CCYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss[Z|(+|-)hh:mm]

___Validity.description: The number of seconds after CreationTime that this entity should be considered relevant

___Extension.description: Key/value pairs enabling the association of extra information not captured by the model

___ID.description: A globally unique identifier for this entity
